data.title: I Code
data.subTitle: About Me
data.heading: Hi, I'm Mayank. I am a full stack developer based out of Pune, India having over 4+ years of experience in building web apps.

content.text: In my small experince of 4 years, I have worked mostly in travel domains building over 4 different travel products in Angular 2+ versions. Apart from this I have also experience in React JS, Vue JS, Spring boot, Node Js building various enterprise level apps.

My love for exploring different technologies help me to keep on going from project to project and try on different roles and challenges. I'm a fast learner and quickly adapt to new skills and can easily juggle different projects and roles with relative ease.
